summary: This bill, the "Improving Veterans Access to Congressional Services Act of 2025," directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to allow Members of Congress to use VA facilities for meetings with constituents. The bill outlines regulations regarding space availability, rent, and prohibited activities to govern this use. These regulations include compliance with the Hatch Act and restrictions on political campaigning, and limit use during the 60 days before an election. The bill aims to facilitate better communication between members of congress and their veteran constituents.
